entry.title: Maria and Matt led the UVA WiCS Hackathon CS Research Workshop

link.title: Maria and Matt led the UVA WiCS Hackathon CS Research Workshop

entry.content: PhD Students Maria Cardei and Matt Clark led the UVA Women in Computer Science (WiCS) CS Research Workshop.
entry.summary: PhD Students Maria Cardei and Matt Clark led the UVA Women in Computer Science (WiCS) CS Research Workshop.

entry.title: IEEE/ACM CHASE Regular Paper Publication
entry.content: Our paper “Predicting the Severity of Anxiety in Adolescents Through Passively Sensed Behaviors” by Elaine Zhang, Matt Clark, and Afsaneh Doryab has been accepted as a regular paper to the 2025 IEEE/ACM Conference on Connected Health: Applications, Systems, and Engineering Technologies (IEEE/ACM CHASE ‘25).
entry.summary: Our paper “Predicting the Severity of Anxiety in Adolescents Through Passively Sensed Behaviors” by Elaine Zhang, Matt Clark, and Afsaneh Doryab has been accepted as a regular paper to the 2025 IEEE/ACM Conference on Connected Health: Applications, Systems, and Engineering Technologies (IEEE/ACM CHASE ‘25).

entry.title: Computing Research Association Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Award

link.title: Computing Research Association Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Award

entry.content: Congratulations to Andrew Balch for being named as a finalist for the Computing Research Association’s Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher award! Just 24 students nationwide received this level of recognition for their contributions to computing research. You can learn more about the award at the CRA website.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Andrew Balch for being named as a finalist for the Computing Research Association’s Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher award! Just 24 students nationwide received this level of recognition for their contributions to computing research. You can learn more about the award at the CRA website.

entry.title: Maria Cardei reelected to Computer Science Graduate Student Group

link.title: Maria Cardei reelected to Computer Science Graduate Student Group

entry.content: PhD student Maria Cardei has been reelected for another term as the Social Chair in UVA’s Computer Science Graduate Student Group.
entry.summary: PhD student Maria Cardei has been reelected for another term as the Social Chair in UVA’s Computer Science Graduate Student Group.

entry.title: MobiCom 2024 Presentations
entry.content: Undergraduate Student Andrew Balch presented a demo of a smartphone-based spectrophotometer for micronutrient assessment at MobiCom 2024 in Washington D.C.! His presentation was awarded 3rd place in the undergraduate category of MobiCom’s Student Research Competition. Check out this page to learn more about the nutrition project!
entry.summary: Undergraduate Student Andrew Balch presented a demo of a smartphone-based spectrophotometer for micronutrient assessment at MobiCom 2024 in Washington D.C.! His presentation was awarded 3rd place in the undergraduate category of MobiCom’s Student Research Competition. Check out this page to learn more about the nutrition project!

entry.title: IEEE CASE 2024 Paper Publication
entry.content: Our paper Practical Heuristics for Victim Tagging During a Mass Casualty Incident Emergency Medical Response authored by PhD student Maria Cardei and Afsaneh Doryab, has been published in the 2024 IEEE 20th International Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE). Maria traveled to Bari, Italy to present our work!
entry.summary: Our paper Practical Heuristics for Victim Tagging During a Mass Casualty Incident Emergency Medical Response authored by PhD student Maria Cardei and Afsaneh Doryab, has been published in the 2024 IEEE 20th International Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE). Maria traveled to Bari, Italy to present our work!

entry.title: UbiComp 2024 Presentations
entry.content: PhD Student Matt Clark presented two Melodies papers at UbiComp 2024 in Melbourne, Australia! He also served as a student volunteer for the conference, winning an award for exemplory service!
entry.summary: PhD Student Matt Clark presented two Melodies papers at UbiComp 2024 in Melbourne, Australia! He also served as a student volunteer for the conference, winning an award for exemplory service!

entry.title: UVA Today Feature
entry.content: Andrew Balch was featured in a piece by UVA Today on the Dean’s Undergraduate Research Fellowship program! You can check it out here.
entry.summary: Andrew Balch was featured in a piece by UVA Today on the Dean’s Undergraduate Research Fellowship program! You can check it out here.

entry.title: Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness

link.title: Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness

entry.content: Our workshop paper “Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness for Users with Diverse Musical Backgrounds” by Jason Chin, Matt Clark, and Afsaneh Doryab has been accepted to the WellComp 2024 workshop at UbiComp.
entry.summary: Our workshop paper “Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness for Users with Diverse Musical Backgrounds” by Jason Chin, Matt Clark, and Afsaneh Doryab has been accepted to the WellComp 2024 workshop at UbiComp.

entry.title: ICCPS 2024 Abstract Publication
entry.content: Our abtract “Multi-Agent System for Optimizing Victim Tagging in Human/Autonomous Responder Teams” by PhD student Maria Cardei and Afsaneh Doryab, has been published in the 2024 ACM/IEEE 15th International Conference on Cyber-Physical Systems (ICCPS).
entry.summary: Our abtract “Multi-Agent System for Optimizing Victim Tagging in Human/Autonomous Responder Teams” by PhD student Maria Cardei and Afsaneh Doryab, has been published in the 2024 ACM/IEEE 15th International Conference on Cyber-Physical Systems (ICCPS).
